__calendar_pageblocks_calendar_desc__: Embed a calendar view on your homepage. You can add information to each day of the calendar.
__calendar_pageblocks_calendar_global_de: You can embed the calendar multiple times, each will have the same entries. If disabled, each pageblock have it's own entries.
__calendar_pageblocks_calendar_internali: Internal info (Is only visible for page admins)
__calendar_pageblocks_calendar_info1__: You can edit information of each calendar day by clicking on the day directly in the calender, while your are in edit mode.
